comments.creator: meet.mrnrg@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

When coding:
onchange="onKeyUp(this, 'findButton');" 
onblur="onKeyUp(this, 'findButton');"
onfocus="onKeyUp(this, 'findButton');"
onmouseup="onKeyUp(this, 'findButton');"
onkeydown="onEnter(event,this,'findButton');onKeyUp(this, 'findButton');"/>

Events don't trigger when using MOUSE SELECTION of save form field values,
eg. Java, HTML, FireFox, Browser, CSS are saved form values in drop down list history, ENTER selection works, MOUSE LEFT click selection does not trigger one 
or more of the JavaScript events, say when selecting the 3rd value FireFox.


Actual results:

MOUSE LEFT click selection does not trigger one 
or more of the JavaScript events.


Expected results:

MOUSE LEFT click and Keyboard ENTER selection should both trigger one or more
of the events.

Thank you.
comments.author: meet.mrnrg@gmail.com
